metadata.Title: CVE-2022-39050 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.Description: An attacker who is logged into OTRS as an admin user may manipulatecustomer URL field to store JavaScript code to be run later by any otheragent when clicking the customer URL link. Then the stored JavaScript isexecuted in the context of OTRS. The same issue applies for the usage ofexternal data sources e.g. database or ldap

criterions.comment: znuny package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
